caption:
This photograph depicts an elderly Black man standing on a city street. He is dressed in a somewhat formal and distinctive manner. He wears a light-colored straw hat, a yellow dress shirt, and a dark pinstriped suit jacket. His shirt is accessorized with a large ruffled yellow front and a large, ornate bow tie. In one hand, he holds a dark cane with a curved handle, and on his left hand he wears a ring. His expression is serious and he is looking directly at the camera.

The background of the photograph shows a street scene with cars from the 1970s era, some pedestrians at a distance, and the façades of city buildings, which include signs and storefronts. The ambiance suggests an urban environment with active street life. The image captures a sense of personal style and an era-specific urban setting.
title: 'Man on the street'
